What We Look For

Pure Obsession

Founders with a deeply personal motivation for their craft.

Big Swings

Ideas for changing the rules of the game.

Coup d'œil

Mastery of strategic intuition, with a clear view of the path to success.

Competitive Advantage

Business models that could convincingly achieve sustained barriers to entry.

Perpetual Motion

Overwhelming tendency toward non-stop action.

Kindness

Founders and teams who are kind at heart... life is too short for anything less.
